messages.welcome_format: Welcome to the land of Horse Isle, %USERNAME%!!

profile.blocked: Profile NOT SAVED, Chat Violations Present! (%REASON%)

messages.buddy_request: Attempting to Add Buddy.  The other player must click ADD BUDDY as well. (Many players reserve this for just a couple players so don't feel insulted if they do not).
messages.playtime_timeout: You have run out of playtime for now.  In one minute you will be disconnected.  You gain one minute of playtime every 8 minutes.  Please come back later!
messages.random_movement: You are sooo %STAT%. You wander %MSG% in a different direction.
messages.incorrect_password: Incorrect.  You will have to find the correct answer somewhere...
messages.no_telescope: You do not have a telescope to use! You try making circles with your hands and placing them in front of one eye,  but it is of minimal aid...
messages.starved_horse: You have been sent to Prison Isle for starving one of your horses! They have been fed for you.

auto_reply.contains_violations: There were chat violations in the AutoReply. NOT SETUP.

rng_message: Don't forget to pet your kitty/dog/fish/stuffed animal.
Don't forget to stretch once in a while.
Are you running late for school/work?!?!
Aren't you sleepy? It's okay to go to bed.  We'll all be here tomorrow.
Please take a break and check on your family/pets/world. :)
Please take breaks once in a while.
Hmmmm..  This game isn't THAT cool. :)
timed_messages.playtime_message: You have been playing for %TOTALHOURS% hours.

chat_errors.cant_find_player: Could not find player to Private chat!
chat_errors.ads_once_per_minute: Ads may only be posted once per minute.
chat_errors.global_chats_limited: CHAT NOT SENT: Global chats are limited (+1 earned per 2 minutes). Please chat using CHAT NEAR/ISLAND/BUDDIES when possible.
chat_errors.global_too_long: CHAT NOT SENT: Global chats are limited to 150 characters. Please try to keep the global chat brief when possible. (Use CTRL+UP arrow to edit)
chat_errors.ads_too_long: CHAT NOT SENT: Ads chats are limited to 150 characters. Please try to keep the ads chat brief when possible. (Use CTRL+UP arrow to edit)

mods_revenge.event_start: MODS' REVENGE: Mods' revenge has begun! For the next 10 minutes, any mod that hits you with a Splatterball will earn you $500. Go find Mods and make yourself a target! Only one payout per Mod.
mods_revenge.event_end: MODS REVENGE: Mods Revenge is now over. All Splatterballs removed.

water_balloon_game.event_start: WATER BALLOON FIGHT: You have just been given 8 Water Balloons. Whoever gets hit the MOST in 5 minutes (60 game minutes) will win a prize (hits on yourself are not counted).
water_balloon_game.event_won: You are a Water Balloon winner! Prize: $20,000
water_balloon_game.event_end: WATER BALLOON FIGHT OVER: Here were the winners:

isle_card_trading_game.event_start: ISLE CARD TRADING GAME: You have just been given FOUR Isle Trading Cards. They are identical. To win at this game, you will need exactly one of each stallion, mare, colt and filly card in 5 minutes (60 game minutes).
isle_card_trading_game.event_disqualified: ISLE CARDS TIME IS UP: You are disqualified for having over 4 cards!
isle_card_trading_game.event_one_type: ISLE CARDS TIME IS UP: You only have one type of card. Removing cards.
isle_card_trading_game.event_two_type: ISLE CARDS TIME IS UP: You only have two types of cards. Removing cards.
isle_card_trading_game.event_three_type: ISLE CARDS TIME IS UP: You have three types of cards! Better luck next time. Removing cards.
isle_card_trading_game.event_no_cards: ISLE CARDS TIME IS UP: You don't have any isle cards!
isle_card_trading_game.event_win: ISLE CARDS TIME IS UP: You have all four cards! Great work! Prize=$25,000

real_time_riddle.event_start: CHAT RIDDLE: %RIDDLETEXT% (answer first via any chat method)
real_time_riddle.event_end: TIME IS UP: No one answered the Chat Riddle in time.
real_time_riddle.event_solved_already: You have already solved this real time riddle.

tack_shop_giveaway.event_start: TACK SHOP HORSE GIVEAWAY: A %COLOR% %BREED% %GENDER% will be given away to one random person at %SHOPNAME% in %TOWN% in 2 minutes!!!
tack_shop_giveaway.event_1min: TACK SHOP HORSE GIVEAWAY: A %COLOR% %BREED% %GENDER% will be given away to one random person at %SHOPNAME% in %TOWN% in 1 minute!!!
tack_shop_giveaway.event_won: TACK SHOP HORSE GIVEAWAY: %PLAYERNAME% has won the %BREED% horse Giveaway at %SHOPNAME% in %TOWN%! Thanks to all %PLAYERCOUNT% players that attended the event.
tack_shop_giveaway.event_end: TACK SHOP HORSE GIVEAWAY: No one was at %SHOPNAME% in %TOWN% to win the horse. Oh well, event is over.

real_time_quiz.event_meta:
^ATReal Time Quiz - Q: %QUESTIONNUMBER%/8^HFirst player to answer all 8 questions wins!
You have made %MISTAKES% mistakes so far.

Question #%QUESTIONNUMBER% (Category: %CATEGORY%):
%QUESTIONTEXT%^PLAnswer (simplest form):|^PS15|SUBMIT^R3^LType QUIT if you want to give up.^R1
real_time_quiz.event_start: REAL TIME QUIZ: Type !QUIZ to attempt the 8 question, 5 minute Real Time Quiz. Prizes for all that participate. Feel free to search the web for answers you don't know.
real_time_quiz.event_end: QUIZ TIME IS UP: No one had answered all questions.
real_time_quiz.event_entered: You have entered the Realtime Quiz. Good luck!
real_time_quiz.event_quit: Realtime quiz was quit already.  Only one try per Quiz.

horse_leaser.cant_afford: You cannot afford the lease fee.
horse_leaser.temporary_horse_added: New temporary horse added to your horse list.
horse_leaser.horses_full: You cannot manage any more horses.
horse_leaser.returned_to_uniter: The %HORSENAME%'s time with you has ended. You were taken back to the Uniter.
horse_leaser.returned_to_uniter_pegasus: The Pegasus' time with you has ended. You were taken back to the Uniter.
horse_leaser.returned_to_owner: Your leased horse %HORSENAME% has been returned to the owner.

treasure.pirate_treasure: Wow!  You found buried treasure worth $%PRIZE%! Gotta love those pirates!
treasure.pot_of_gold: YEA!  You found the fabled pot of gold at the end of the rainbow! It was worth $%PRIZE%!

new_user.starting_message:
Welcome Newest Rider of Horse Isle!
Start by talking to Welcome Willy in the cabin. Click the TALK button by his name in the right hand window. He will know the location of a buried treasure on this island! Move to the spot he describes using the arrow keys. Then Click the WRENCH Icon at the lower right.

bank.cant_hold_that_much: The bank cannot hold that amount of money for you!
bank.cant_withdraw_that_much: The bank does not condone walking around with over 2.1 billion dollars!

fountain.drank_your_fill: You drank your fill from the fountain.
fountain.dropped_money: Oh no!!!  While drinking you accidentally dropped $%MONEY% into the fountain!!  There is no way to get it back!

consume.consumed_but_max_reached: You could not finish it all. Some was wasted.

equips.equip_competition_gear_format: The %ITEM% are now selected as competition gear.
equips.max_jewelry: Only 4 pieces of jewelry can be worn at one time.

sec_code.invalid_sec_code: Data Code Error. You did not get the bonus. You should reconnect if you get this message again.
sec_code.item_earned_full_inv: You Earned a %ITEM% but DID NOT have room for it!
sec_code.highscore_beaten: You just beat your best score! New high score: %SCORE%.
sec_code.best_highscore_beaten: CONGRATULATIONS! You just beat the all time top score! BONUS: $2,500

dropped_items.grab_message: You grabbed an object off the ground.
dropped_items.grab_all_message: You grabbed all objects off the ground.
dropped_items.dropped_item_message: You dropped an item on the ground.
dropped_items.grab_but_inv_full: Your inventory is full! Cannot grab items.
dropped_items.grab_all_but_inv_full: You grabbed what you could, but your inventory is full.
dropped_items.drop_tile_full: Cannot drop any more objects here, too many on ground already.
dropped_items.other_picked_up: You reached for it,  but someone else must have grabbed it first.

shop.cant_afford_5: You cannot afford 5 of that item!
shop.cant_afford_25: You cannot afford 25 of that item!
shop.brought_1_but_inv_full: Your inventory is full! Cannot buy that item.
shop.brought_5_but_inv_full: Your inventory cannot hold 5 more! Cannot buy those items.
shop.brought_25_but_inv_full: Your inventory cannot hold 25 more! Cannot buy those items.
shop.cant_hold_extra_money: You cannot carry around the extra money this would earn you! (2.1B max)

tools.binoculars: You search high and low all around,  but find nothing interesting.
tools.magnify: You look all over at all the tiny details, but alas, nothing interesting.
tools.rake: You rake all over,  but uncover nothing interesting.
tools.shovel: You dig all over, but turn up nothing.

warp.only_unicorn: Only a ridden unicorn can respond to such a request.
warp.location_unknown: Unicorn Failed to understand location or player name to warp to.

prison_isle.message: You have been sent to Prison isle by a Moderator. You must have been bad.

rules_isle.message: You have been sent to Review the game rules by a Moderator. Please take the time to seriously review the rules so you have a more enjoyable game experience. Your chat has been blocked for 20 minutes to help you focus on the rules.
rules_isle.command_msg: %USERNAME% muted for 20 minutes and Sent to Study Rules.

disconnect.banned: Your account has been BANNED. You will no longer be able to login
disconnect.kicked: An Admin Has KICKED You. This probably means your account is blocked.  Please email support@horseisle.com if you need further information..
disconnect.no_playtime: You have run out of Time for this session. As an unsubscriber you gain one minute of playtime every 8 minutes.  Please come back later!

client_timeout.warn_message: You have been idle for %WARN% minutes.  You will be disconnected at %KICK% minutes idle

login.banned: Your account has been banned. This occurs when too many rules have been broken.
login.ip_banned: Your IP address has been blocked (%IP%)

abuse_report.report_filed: Your abuse report will be reviewed by an admin and appropriate action will be taken.
abuse_report.valid_reason: Please provide a valid reason for abuse report!

meta.fountain: Although it's not recommended, you could drink from this fountain if you are thirsty...^T6Drink from the public fountain. ^B1D^R1^X^Z
meta.venus_flytrap_format:
The Giant Venus Flytrap chomped at you!
OUCH!!
It chomped your pocket, taking $%MONEY% with it!!
meta.hammock: You and all of your horses have fully rested.

mute_command.player_ignoring_your_pm: %USERNAME% does not receive your chats. (Don't take it personally, some players don't like to chat)
mute_command.player_ignoring_your_br: Player is ignoring you. You cannot add them as a buddy.
mute_command.player_ignoring_your_socials: Player is ignoring you. They cannot receive your socials.
mute_command.player_ignoring_all_pm: %USERNAME% has disabled all Private Messages.
mute_command.player_ignoring_all_br: Player is ignoring Buddy requests from everyone.
mute_command.cant_send_in_muted_channel: You cannot chat on a Muted Channel.
mute_command.cant_send_pm_muted: You cannot send private chats because you have muted that channel.  Try !UNMUTE PM
mute_command.cant_send_br_muted: You cannot add buddies while muting your Buddy Request channel.  Try !UNMUTE BR.
mute_command.cant_send_pm_player_muted: You cannot send a chat to %USERNAME% because you have muted them. Unmute them from the player list if you wish to chat.

auto_sell.not_standing_sameplace: You must be at the same place as the seller or at their ranch.
auto_sell.toomany_horses: You do not have any room for another horse. Barns on your ranch allow for more horses.
auto_sell.you_sold: AUTO-SELL: You sold your horse %HORSE% for %PRICE% to %USERNAME%!
auto_sell.sold_offline: You sold your horse %HORSE% for $%PRICE% to %USERNAME%!

two_player.other_player: ^LThe following other players are in the game room:^R1
two_player.game_in_progress:
You are playing the game with %PLAYERNAME% in the other window.
When you are done, please click QUIT in that window.
two_player.your_invited: You have been invited to play by %PLAYERNAME%, click ACCEPT to play.
two_player.you_invited: You have invited %PLAYERNAME% to play.  Please wait for them to hit Accept if they want.
two_player.starting_game: Starting up two player game with %PLAYERNAME%!

add_buddy.add_pending: Attempting to Add Buddy.  The other player must click ADD BUDDY as well. (Many players reserve this for just a couple players so don't feel insulted if they do not).
add_buddy.other_pending: %PLAYERNAME% is trying to add you as a buddy,  click ADD BUDDY to make them a buddy.

trade.trade_wait_for_done: ^LWaiting for other player to click DONE.^R1
trade.other_player_is_done: ^LOther player is DONE adding things to the offer.^R1
trade.final_review: ^HFinal Trade Review - Only accept if you feel trade is 100% Fair!
trade.when_done_click: ^T8When you are done offering things click ^D59|DONE^R1
trade.cancel_anytime: ^T6You may cancel trade at any time^B1J%PLAYERID%^R1
trade.what_to_offer: What would you like to offer %PLAYERNAME%?
trade.offer_object_inv_full: ^LTheir inventory is currently full, so no giving objects.^R1
trade.money_offer_submenu: How much money do you want to OFFER player?^PMAmount of money to offer:|%CURRENTMONEYOFFER%^PS3|Add to offer^R1
trade.trade_ridden_horse: You had to stop riding your horse since you are trading it!
trade.waiting_for_other_to_accept: Waiting for other player to Accept or Reject trade...
trade.requires_both_players: Trade process requires other player to click TRADE with you also before it will start.
trade.trade_canceled_moved: Trade canceled upon players leaving same spot.
trade.object_offer_atleast_1: You must offer at least one of an item.
trade.object_offer_too_much: You only have %QUANTITY% of that item,  not %ENTEREDAMOUNT%.
trade.money_offer_too_much: You do not have that much money to give! Your heart is bigger than your wallet I'm afraid.
trade.other_player_has_negative_money: They do not have enough money for the trade.
trade.you_have_negative_money: You do not have enough money for the trade!
trade.cant_handle_more_horses: You cannot handle this many more horses!
trade.other_player_cant_handle_more_horses: Player %PLAYERNAME% cannot handle this many more horses!
trade.other_carry_more: Buyer cannot carry that quantity of one of the items!
trade.you_cant_carry_more: You cannot carry that quantity of one of the items!
trade.trade_not_allowed_while_bidding: No trades allowed while you are bidding on a Horse at auction.
trade.trade_not_allowed_while_other_is_bidding: No trades allowed while other player bidding on a Horse at auction.
trade.trade_other_cannot_carry_that_much: The other player can not carry that much more money
trade.trade_you_cannot_carry_that_much: You would not be able to carry all that money if trade completed. (2.1B max!)

auction.you_have_too_many_horses: You cannot have any more horses right now without more barns.
auction.only_one_winning_bid_allowed: You can only have a winning bid on one horse at a time.
auction.one_horse_at_a_time: Only one horse per player allowed up for auction at a time.
auction.list_horse:
^HIt costs you $1,000 to auction. If you wish to set a minimum bid for your horse, bid on it yourself. All auctions run for 8 minutes.
Select from one of your horses to auction:^R1
auction.no_other_transaction_allowed: No other money transactions allowed while bidding on a Horse at auction.
auction.outbid_by: You have been outbid by %USERNAME%.  High bid is now $%AMOUNT%.
auction.cant_afford_listing: You cannot afford the auction fee.
auction.brought_horse: You bought a horse at auction for $%MONEY%
auction.no_one_brought: No one bought your horse at auction.
auction.horse_sold: You sold a horse at auction for $%MONEY%

mail.mail_received: A message has been sent to you from another player. It is in your inventory now.
mail.mail_ripped: You permanently ripped up the message.
mail.mail_read:
Reading a Mail Message from Player
By: %PLAYERNAME% (DATE:%DATE%) :

%SUBJECT%

%MESSAGE%

^T5To get rid of message:^B4Z%RANDOMID%^R5

city_hall.menu: The little post office here can deliver a message to someone on Horse Isle.  Postage is $3 per message.^T5Write a message to another player?^D2|COMPOSE^R1^LAlso, the hall has records on several subjects:^R1^T4View current Horses up for Sale^D29|AUTOSELL HORSES^R1^T4View top valued ranches^D14|RANCH RECORDS^R1^T4View richest players^D15|MONEY RECORDS^R1^T4View top spoiled horses^D61|SPOILED HORSES^R1^T4View most adventurous players^D16|QUEST RECORDS^R1^T4View most experienced players^D17|EXPER RECORDS^R1^T4View most active minigamers^D18|GAMES RECORDS^R1^T4View top players' horses^D19|HORSE RECORDS^R1
city_hall.mail_send_meta: ^LComposing a message to another player in Horse Isle^R1^PLSend to Player Name:|^PLSubject:|^LMessage:^R1^PB120|^PS2|MAIL MESSAGE
city_hall.sent_mail: Your message will be given to %PLAYERNAME% the next time they visit a Town Hall
city_hall.cant_find_player: Could not find a player named (%PLAYERNAME%) to address the letter to!

most_active_minigame_players.top_25:

riddler.riddle_format:
Welcome to an Enigmatic Perplexing Conundrum!
(Answer with the simplest form possible. There is no penalty for wrong answers. DO NOT discuss the riddles in Global Chat)

auto_sell.auto_sell_meta:
Auto-Selling a horse:
By setting this value, any other player can buy this horse from you at any time. If you have a Ranch, they can even buy the horse when you are offline! (Put the cost to 0 to stop it from being for auto-sale.)^PMAuto-Sell horse for:|%AUTOSELL%^PS10|SET COST

abuse_report.options_format:
Horse Isle Abuse Reports:
Abuse reports are serious. Think of it as reporting to the police.
Please, only serious issues! It takes a lot of time to deal with these.
What type of violation is this:
%REASONS%^M^Z

reasons.name: SOMEONE HURT MY FEELINGS
reasons.meta:
We are sorry your feelings were hurt. People play this game from all over the world. There are many different customs and ways of behaving. If it was serious please ignore or MUTE the offending player.
Thanks!
By not submitting an abuse report you save us time so that we can work on adding to the game!^M^Z

reasons.name: SOMEONE ASKED MY AGE OR LOCATION
reasons.meta:
Many people do not realize or remember this rule. Please ignore them or explain it is against the rules. If they continue to ask MUTE the offending player.
Thanks!
By not submitting an abuse report you save us time so that we can work on adding to the game!^M^Z

reasons.name: AN ABUSE REPORT WAS FILED AGAINST ME
reasons.meta:
Abuse reports filed against a player without reason get the SUBMITTER in trouble. DO NOT FILE AN ABUSE REPORT FOR THIS, as you will just get yourself in trouble also! We are fair, and ignore any unwarranted abuse reports.
Thanks!
By not submitting an abuse report you save us time so that we can work on adding to the game!^M^Z

reasons.name: SOMEONE SWORE AT ME
reasons.meta:
SUBMIT HORSE ISLE ABUSE REPORT:
ONLY submit SERIOUS and CLEAR violations of Horse Isle rules. They must have just been broken NOW. (The last few minutes of chat log will be sent along with this report. The violation must be in that). Please be sure you have read and understand the rules prior to submitting. False submissions, or those where you provoked the other player may be counted against you!^PLOffenders Username:|^H(RULES: Swearing / Cruelty / Personal Info / Cheating)^PLWhich Rule Broken?:|^PS12|SUBMIT REPORT^M^Z

reasons.name: SOMEONE ASKED MY ADDRESS OR PHONE
reasons.meta:
SUBMIT HORSE ISLE ABUSE REPORT:
ONLY submit SERIOUS and CLEAR violations of Horse Isle rules. They must have just been broken NOW. (The last few minutes of chat log will be sent along with this report. The violation must be in that). Please be sure you have read and understand the rules prior to submitting. False submissions, or those where you provoked the other player may be counted against you!^PLOffenders Username:|^H(RULES: Swearing / Cruelty / Personal Info / Cheating)^PLWhich Rule Broken?:|^PS12|SUBMIT REPORT^M^Z

reasons.name: SOMEONE DID CHAT SPAM
reasons.meta:
Please ask the player to stop and explain it is against the rules. If they continue, ignore or MUTE the offending player.
Thanks!
By not submitting an abuse report you save us time so that we can work on adding to the game!^M^Z

reasons.name: SOMEONE WAS BEGGING
reasons.meta:
Please explain that it's against the rules. If they continue to bother you please ignore or MUTE the offending player.
Thanks!
By not submitting an abuse report you save us time so that we can work on adding to the game!^M^Z

reasons.name: SOMEONE WAS ANNOYING
reasons.meta:
Please ignore or MUTE the offending player. Do not reply to the player or start a fight.
Thanks!
By not submitting an abuse report you save us time so that we can work on adding to the game!^M^Z

reasons.name: SOMEONE DID AN UNFAIR TRADE
reasons.meta:
Only accept trades that are fair in themselves. For example, instead of giving a player money and then hoping they will trade you their horse, have the player offer you their horse for the money desired. This prevents any trades from not completing. If a player lied or tricked you into an unfair trade, you may report that if it happened within the last 5 minutes.
^D28c12|PLAYER LIED TRICKING ME^R1Thanks!
By not submitting an abuse report you save us time so that we can work on adding to the game!^M^Z

reasons.name: ANOTHER SERIOUS REASON
reasons.meta:
SUBMIT HORSE ISLE ABUSE REPORT:
ONLY submit SERIOUS and CLEAR violations of Horse Isle rules. They must have just been broken NOW. (The last few minutes of chat log will be sent along with this report. The violation must be in that). Please be sure you have read and understand the rules prior to submitting. False submissions, or those where you provoked the other player may be counted against you!^PLOffenders Username:|^H(RULES: Swearing / Cruelty / Personal Info / Cheating)^PLWhich Rule Broken?:|^PS12|SUBMIT REPORT^M^Z

chat.violation_format: Your last chat was flagged as a possible violation of chat rules to be reviewed by an admin. If it is severe or you have many violations your account may be suspended. We require at least %AMOUNT% violation points before examining an account, so if it was a simple misspelling do not worry. Remember this is a family friendly game! Thanks for keeping it as such! (REASON: %REASON%)
chat.password_included: Your Password was included in the chat you attempted to send!  DO NOT Give ANYONE your password!  If someone was asking for your password,  please report them immediately!
chat.caps_notice: Please do not use all CAPS, it looks as if you are yelling.
